author: epg
msg: (log-report/Request): Note paths are optional and add

author: epg
msg: (merge): Don't log target->info->repos_path in the operational log;
it's completely redundant to the repository itself (just look at
the changed paths for the revision!) and doesn't really work
anyway:  repos_path is the path passed to svn_ra_open2, which is
the longest common path of all commit targets for svn_client, but
not necessarily for other clients (some always open the root).

author: glasser
msg: Make at least one case of merge --reintegrate actually work!  The
shell script that we've been using to test this feature actually
passes now!  (We should write Python tests, of course.)
mergeinfo hash; add source_repos_root arg.  Use a subpool.
(svn_client_merge_reintegrate): Adjust.  Add some new debug output.
Remove some extraneous reparenting (since we don't actually pass
